node.title: Lead Organizer of a Blood Donation Drive
node.description: Oversaw close to 1000+ students actively participating in the Donation Drive which was organized at Sagar Hospitals, Bengaluru.

node.title: Development of Calamity Control
node.description: A project created at the nick of time to crowd-source disaster information and get a more detailed area-by-area view on the safezones of a calamity struck area, compared to the disaster safety check by Facebook.

node.title: Development of ChennaiRains.org
node.description: A crowd-sourced repository of information created overnight that was used at a time of dire need by many people stranded in the floods of Chennai and surrounding areas.
